description: AzureResourceTag is a tag to apply to Azure resources created for the cluster.

key.description: key is the key part of the tag. A tag key can have a maximum of 128 characters and cannot be empty. Key must begin with a letter, end with a letter, number or underscore, and must contain only alphanumeric characters and the following special characters `_ . -`.

value.description: value is the value part of the tag. A tag value can have a maximum of 256 characters and cannot be empty. Value must contain only alphanumeric characters and the following special characters `_ + , - . / : ; < = > ? @`.
